original_text: And it came to pass, that in the morning watch the Lord looked unto the host of the Egyptians through the pillar of fire and of the cloud, and troubled the host of the Egyptians,
korean_text: 새벽에 여호와께서 불과 구름 기둥 가운데서 애굽 군대를 보시고 애굽 군대를 어지럽게 하시며

sentences.original_text: the Lord looked unto the host of the Egyptians
through the pillar of fire and of the cloud
and troubled the host of the Egyptians
